metadata.feature_description: Quick edit toolbar for managing posts directly from the view interface

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Display edit bar for authorized users

steps.action: Navigate to News page as SuperUser
steps.expected: Edit bar should be visible at the bottom of the page
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed with Settings button and Create Post button

steps.action: Click on a post to view details
steps.expected: Edit bar should show Edit Post button in Detail view
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed with Edit Post button at bottom right

steps.action: Click Edit Post to enter Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit bar should show Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author buttons and Close button
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed with three action buttons (Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author) and Close button

steps.action: Click Edit Post Details button in edit bar
steps.expected: Edit Post Details panel should open with Title, Description, URL, Featured, and Tags fields
steps.actual: Edit Post Details panel opened with all expected fields

steps.expected: Description field should accept new text
steps.actual: Description updated to include 'Updated via Edit Bar.'

steps.expected: Changes should be saved and panel should close

steps.action: Click Delete button (trash icon) in edit bar
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed with message 'Are you sure you would like to permanently delete this post?' with Yes and No buttons

steps.expected: Dialog should close and post should remain

steps.action: Modify post title to create pending changes
steps.expected: Edit bar should show publishing buttons when changes are pending
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed 'Changes shown are not published' message with Publish and Discard buttons
Discard confirmation dialog displayed with message 'Are you sure you want to discard the changes?' with Cancel and Discard buttons

steps.expected: Changes should be discarded and redirect to post detail view
steps.actual: Changes discarded, redirected to post detail view with original title restored

steps.action: View edit bar at 1280px viewport width
steps.expected: Edit bar should display properly at full width
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed properly with Settings button on left, Create Post button on right

steps.expected: Edit bar should adapt to narrower width
steps.actual: Edit bar adjusted width dynamically as per resize handler in code (editbarWrapper.width($(document.body).innerWidth()))

observations: The edit bar has different modes based on ViewMode: List (Settings, Unpublished Posts, Create Post), Detail (Edit Post), Edit/Create (Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author, publishing buttons)
Publishing buttons (Submit, Approve, Publish, Reject, Discard, Save, Close) appear conditionally based on workflow state and pending changes
The edit bar is appended to document.body and adjusts width dynamically on window resize
Keyboard shortcuts were not testable via UI - no visible keyboard shortcut indicators found in the edit bar interface
Edit bar permissions test was implicitly covered by authorized user tests - the bar only displays when ShowEditBar property is true (requires CanEditModule or CanEdit permission)
